refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis:
#include <libgnomeui/libgnomeui.h>
#define GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_INFO #define GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_WARNING #define GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_ERROR #define GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_QUESTION #define GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_GENERIC struct GnomeMessageBox; GtkWidget* gnome_message_box_new (const gchar *message, const gchar *message_box_type, ...); GtkWidget* gnome_message_box_newv (const gchar *message, const gchar *message_box_type, const gchar **buttons); void gnome_message_box_construct (GnomeMessageBox *messagebox, const gchar *message, const gchar *message_box_type, const gchar **buttons);

refsect2.title: GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_INFO

warning.para: GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_INFO is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A constant that can be passed to gnome_message_box_new() to specify the type of message box to create.

refsect2.title: GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_WARNING

warning.para: GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_WARNING is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A constant that can be passed to gnome_message_box_new() to specify the type of message box to create.

refsect2.title: GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_ERROR

warning.para: GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_ERROR is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A constant that can be passed to gnome_message_box_new() to specify the type of message box to create.

refsect2.title: GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_QUESTION

warning.para: GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_QUESTION is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A constant that can be passed to gnome_message_box_new() to specify the type of message box to create.

refsect2.title: GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_GENERIC

warning.para: GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_GENERIC is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A constant that can be passed to gnome_message_box_new() to specify the type of message box to create.

warning.para: GnomeMessageBox is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

listitem.simpara: A GnomeDialog widget holding the contents of the message box.

refsect2.title: gnome_message_box_new ()

warning.para: gnome_message_box_new is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Creates a dialog box of type message_box_type with message. A number of buttons are inserted on it. You can use the GNOME stock identifiers to create gnome-stock-buttons.

listitem.simpara: A NULL terminated list of strings to use in each button.
a widget that has the dialog box.

refsect2.title: gnome_message_box_newv ()

warning.para: gnome_message_box_newv is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Creates a dialog box of type message_box_type with message. A number of buttons are inserted on it, the messages come from the buttons array. You can use the GNOME stock identifiers to create gnome-stock-buttons. The buttons array can be NULL if you wish to add buttons yourself later.

listitem.simpara: a NULL terminated array with the buttons to insert.
a widget that has the dialog box.

refsect2.title: gnome_message_box_construct ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gnome_message_box_construct (GnomeMessageBox *messagebox, const gchar *message, const gchar *message_box_type, const gchar **buttons);

warning.para: gnome_message_box_construct is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: For language bindings or subclassing, from C use gnome_message_box_new or gnome_message_box_newv

listitem.simpara: a NULL terminated array with the buttons to insert.
